description: Jodie Taylor and Maddie O' Rielly are two bratty co-ed's addicted to feet! So much in fact that in between classes they can't help themselves but to suck, lick, and sniff each others cute soft, peds, white knee socks and suede red flats. Unfortunately, Mr. Wood catches them in their foot free for all and sends them to detention! However, it doesn't take long for these foot vixens to seduce Mr. Wood with their feet until they are all three tangled up in a mess of sweaty socks, saliva covered feet, dripping toes, sex, 4 foot footjob and cum covered toes!
title: Playing Footsies In The Girls Room
